doc.title: $5 Cover: Seattle
doc.plot: The independent music scene in Seattle is a vibrant community of talented musicians. $5 Cover Seattle is a dramatic series from Humpday's Lynn Shelton that takes place over 1 weekend in the lives of 14 Seattle bands as they interact, practice, work, perform and hang out with their friends.

The independent music scene in Seattle is a vibrant community of talented musicians. $5 Cover Seattle is a dramatic series from Humpday's Lynn Shelton that takes place over 1 weekend in the lives of 14 Seattle bands as they interact, practice, work, perform and hang out with their friends.
